fr.lri.swingstates.debug

Class StateMachineVisualization

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.Canvas
              • fr.lri.swingstates.debug.StateMachineVisualization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CElement, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class StateMachineVisualization
extends Canvas
    A canvas that displays a state machine and shows its activity in real time. At each moment:
    • The current state is colored in yellow.
    • The last passed transition is colored in red.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
